page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES IN CHAPEL.
page.content: Games played on the school playground fall into these distinct categories- singing,chasing, ball & skipping. The most popular version of skipping is "Unders & Overs".You jump over & run under the rope."Semi-tick" is a chas- ing game in which you run from semi- circle to semi-circle without being caught.Ball games entail throwing, catching,jumping the ball. In singing games you follow the instructions of the song.Traditional seasonal games are conkers & marbles. At home the favourite board game is Monopoly in which the object is to own the most property by buying & selling. Lots of children have home-computer games."Dungeons & Dragons" is a fantasy game in which you fight enemies & map a strange land.There are also games such as rugby,football, cricket,badminton & tennis.
